Name: ACTION.RECONFIGURE.BOTH
Description: Start both V6 and S6 Configuration

Name: CONF.FLASH.CMD
Description: Sends data from Flash WBUF (clocks/8 â€“ 1) to be sent

Name: STATUS.AMC.ENABLE_MASK
Description: Reads back what was written to Virtex 0x3

Name: STATUS.RECONFIGURE.T1_DONE
Description: if '1', virtex chip DONE is low

Name: STATUS.RECONFIGURE.T1_INIT_B
Description: if '1', virtex chip INIT_B is low

Name: STATUS.TTC.LAST_EVN
Description: TTC event number of last received L1A

Name: STATUS.TTC.LAST_BCN
Description: TTC bunch count of last received L1A

Name: STATUS.TTC.LAST_ORN
Description: TTC orbit number of last received L1A

Name: STATUS.TTC.BCNT_ERROR
Description: TTC Bunch count error counter (8 bits only)

Name: STATUS.TTC.SBIT_ERROR
Description: TTC single bit error count (8 bits only)

Name: STATUS.TTC.MBIT_ERROR
Description: TTC multi bit error count (8 bits only)

Name: CONF.TTC.OVERRIDE_MASK
Description: Bitmask of additional locations to send TTC clock/data

Name: STATUS.TTC_HISTORY.COUNT
Description: Number of entries or oldest entry in TTC history

Name: STATUS.TTC_HISTORY.FULL
Description: TTC history has at least 512 entries

Name: STATUS.TTC_HISTORY.ECR_COUNT
Description: TTC reset event number command counter

Name: CONF.TTC_HISTORY.MASK_CMD__d
Description: TTC history command mask ('1' to ignore bit)

Name: ACTION.DTTRIG.SAMPLE_BUFFER_ENABLE
Description: Trigger time alignment sample buffer when '1'

Name: CONF.DTTRIG.TRIG0_DELAY
Description: Set delay in 1/8 BX steps for TRIG0 input

Name: CONF.DTTRIG.TRIG1_DELAY
Description: Set delay in 1/8 BX steps for TRIG1 input

Name: CONF.DTTRIG.AMC_DELAY_d
Description: Set delay in 1/8 BX steps for AMC input

Name: CONF.DTTRIG.LUT
Description: Look-up table for trigger inputs (512 words)

Name: STATUS.DTTRIG.SAMPLE_BUFFER
Description: Sample buffer for DT trigger input alignment
